articles.title: Scientists discover how brain cells die in Alzheimer’s - BBC
articles.description: The findings, which had been a mystery for decades, give new ideas for treating the disease.
articles.content:
Scientists in the UK and Belgium think they have figured out how brain cells die in Alzheimer's disease.
It has been a mystery and a source of scientific debate for decades.
But the team, writing i… [+3054 chars]
